definitions.definition: Resembling ashes (especially in colour); (of a person’s complexion) unusually pale as a result of strong emotion, illness, etc.
Comprising , containing, or covered with ash.
Having dry or dead skin (therefore discolored).

main_definition: Resembling ashes (especially in colour); (of a person’s complexion) unusually pale as a result of strong emotion, illness, etc.
secondary_definitions: Comprising , containing, or covered with ash.
( African-American Vernacular ) Having dry or dead skin (therefore discolored).
